description: MainActivity class for an Android TV app, managing navigation among Home, VideoDetails, and Player screens via fragments.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity managing fragment navigation for the Android TV application.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the main fragment (HomeFragment).

methods.name: openDetails
methods.description: Opens the VideoDetailsFragment to show video metadata and playback options.

methods.name: playVideo
methods.description: Opens the PlayerFragment to start video playback.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Handles back navigation, either returning to previous fragment or closing activity.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Overrides default back press to call goBack method.
